name: jquery-plugin-typescript-example
description: Example project to demonstrate how to write a jQuery plugin using TypeScript

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run copy:html && npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.minify: uglifyjs dist/example-plugin-bundle.js --output dist/example-plugin-bundle.min.js --source-map dist/example-plugin-bundle.min.js.map --source-map-url example-plugin-bundle.min.js.map --in-source-map dist/example-plugin-bundle.js.map

author: Georg Wittberger <georg.wittberger@gmail.com>
